entry.title: How to build rich, styled input on the web

link.title: How to build rich, styled input on the web

entry.summary: Building rich text editing experiences on the web is tricky. Even adding simple features like bold and italics mean digging into some of the weird, old corners of the HTML standard. This post walks through the basics of how it's done.
